mutants.code:
import re

def extract_ip(input_str: str) -> (str, str):
    ipv4_pattern = ''
    ipv6_pattern = '\\b(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}\\b'
    ipv4_match = re.search(ipv4_pattern, input_str)
    ipv6_match = re.search(ipv6_pattern, input_str)
    ipv4 = ipv4_match.group(0) if ipv4_match else ''
    ipv6 = ipv6_match.group(0) if ipv6_match else ''
    return (ipv4, ipv6)

import re

def extract_ip(input_str: str) -> (str, str):
    ipv4_pattern = '\\b(?:\\d{1,3}\\.){3}\\d{1,3}\\b'
    ipv6_pattern = ''
    ipv4_match = re.search(ipv4_pattern, input_str)
    ipv6_match = re.search(ipv6_pattern, input_str)
    ipv4 = ipv4_match.group(0) if ipv4_match else ''
    ipv6 = ipv6_match.group(0) if ipv6_match else ''
    return (ipv4, ipv6)

import re

def extract_ip(input_str: str) -> (str, str):
    ipv4_pattern = '\\b(?:\\d{1,3}\\.){3}\\d{1,3}\\b'
    ipv6_pattern = '\\b(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}\\b'
    ipv4_match = re.search(ipv4_pattern, input_str)
    ipv6_match = re.search(ipv6_pattern, input_str)
    ipv4 = ipv4_match.group(0) if ipv4_match else 'MUTATED'
    ipv6 = ipv6_match.group(0) if ipv6_match else ''
    return (ipv4, ipv6)

import re

def extract_ip(input_str: str) -> (str, str):
    ipv4_pattern = '\\b(?:\\d{1,3}\\.){3}\\d{1,3}\\b'
    ipv6_pattern = '\\b(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}\\b'
    ipv4_match = re.search(ipv4_pattern, input_str)

    ipv4 = ipv4_match.group(1) if ipv4_match else ''
    ipv6 = ipv6_match.group(0) if ipv6_match else ''
    return (ipv4, ipv6)

import re

def extract_ip(input_str: str) -> (str, str):
    ipv4_pattern = '\\b(?:\\d{1,3}\\.){3}\\d{1,3}\\b'
    ipv6_pattern = '\\b(?:[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}:){7}[0-9a-fA-F]{1,4}\\b'
    ipv4_match = re.search(ipv4_pattern, input_str)
    ipv6_match = re.search(ipv6_pattern, input_str)
    ipv4 = ipv4_match.group(-1) if ipv4_match else ''
    ipv6 = ipv6_match.group(0) if ipv6_match else ''
    return (ipv4, ipv6)
